page.title: 19DUNSTER SCHOOL 2
page.content: Dunster School Today. At the moment the school has 95 children. They are admitted in the educational year that they become 5 years old and leave after the year in which they become 9 years old. When they leave most of the children go on to Minehead Middle School and then, after four years, to the West Somerset School. Amongst the latest technological aids to teaching in the school are a colour television, video recorder and a computer with disc drive on which this information is being recorded.
